name: image-auto-decoding-async
author: dabohaze

sections.description:
When adding media on the post screen, automatically add decoding = “async” to the img tag.

You don’t have to write decoding = “async” manually.

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example
sections.installation:
1. From the WP admin panel, click “Plugins” -> “Add new”.
  2. In the browser input box, type decoding = “async”.
  3. Select the “My Custom Style Css Manager” plugin and click “Install”.
  4. Activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

What about foo bar?

Answer to foo bar dilemma.
